list.name: Changes
list.comment: Changes: - DeviceRoute to save roomId to Device data structure - DeviceRoutes to fix bugs with implementation and add university filtering - Domain to better transmit information between both sides - Hello to have roomId as Int instead of String - Json to save roomId as Int instead of String - RoomService for function that returns list of rooms by id to be filtered by university id - StudyRoomCapacity to be serializable (duuhhh) - Websocket to have better error handling on failure to send capacity and to reflect event changes in their respective marshling/unmarshling

project.component: { "keyToString": { "Docker.docker.db: Compose Deployment.executor": "Run", "Docker.docker.mailhog: Compose Deployment.executor": "Run", "Gradle.Build SIGMS.executor": "Run", "Gradle.Download Sources.executor": "Run", "Kotlin.ApplicationKt.executor": "Run", "ModuleVcsDetector.initialDetectionPerformed": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "SHELLCHECK.PATH": "/home/toms223/.local/share/JetBrains/IntelliJIdea2025.1/Shell Script/shellcheck", "git-widget-placeholder": "master", "last_opened_file_path": "/home/toms223/IdeaProjects/SIGMS", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "project.structure.last.edited": "Modules", "project.structure.proportion": "0.15", "project.structure.side.proportion": "0.2", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "project.propVCSSupport.DirectoryMappings", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" }, "keyToStringList": { "DatabaseDriversLRU": [ "postgresql" ] } }

task.summary: Changes: - Event structure to have polymorphic and interface driven behaviour - Imports in Go - Hardware project structure Add: - Domain.go a file containing all the websocket related domain data - EventData.kt an interface for all event data to implement - ProbeRequests.go a file containing all the packet sniffing commands and processing - Websocket.go a file containing all websocket related operations

Add: - New event structure read and write to DeviceRoute object - Missing serializer mappings in event deserialization - EWMA to capacity by linear mapping - ReadAtIntervalOrByUpdate function to ProbeRequests - Websocket communication logic on hardware - Persistence saving to json on hardware Changes: - Room data class to include roomCapacity - countMacs to be package only function

Add: - DeviceRoutes containing all the API related routes for device actions - StudyRoomCapacity a data class containing information about the current study room capacity like device id, room name and capacity Changes: - AuthenticatedRoutes to include DeviceRoutes - DeviceRoute to allow for setting of roomId to a device - RoomService to include a function that from a list of ids returns a list of rooms.

Changes: - DeviceRoute to save roomId to Device data structure - DeviceRoutes to fix bugs with implementation and add university filtering - Domain to better transmit information between both sides - Hello to have roomId as Int instead of String - Json to save roomId as Int instead of String - RoomService for function that returns list of rooms by id to be filtered by university id - StudyRoomCapacity to be serializable (duuhhh) - Websocket to have better error handling on failure to send capacity and to reflect event changes in their respective marshling/unmarshling

MESSAGE.value: Changes: - Event structure to have polymorphic and interface driven behaviour - Imports in Go - Hardware project structure Add: - Domain.go a file containing all the websocket related domain data - EventData.kt an interface for all event data to implement - ProbeRequests.go a file containing all the packet sniffing commands and processing - Websocket.go a file containing all websocket related operations

Add: - New event structure read and write to DeviceRoute object - Missing serializer mappings in event deserialization - EWMA to capacity by linear mapping - ReadAtIntervalOrByUpdate function to ProbeRequests - Websocket communication logic on hardware - Persistence saving to json on hardware Changes: - Room data class to include roomCapacity - countMacs to be package only function

Add: - DeviceRoutes containing all the API related routes for device actions - StudyRoomCapacity a data class containing information about the current study room capacity like device id, room name and capacity Changes: - AuthenticatedRoutes to include DeviceRoutes - DeviceRoute to allow for setting of roomId to a device - RoomService to include a function that from a list of ids returns a list of rooms.

Changes: - DeviceRoute to save roomId to Device data structure - DeviceRoutes to fix bugs with implementation and add university filtering - Domain to better transmit information between both sides - Hello to have roomId as Int instead of String - Json to save roomId as Int instead of String - RoomService for function that returns list of rooms by id to be filtered by university id - StudyRoomCapacity to be serializable (duuhhh) - Websocket to have better error handling on failure to send capacity and to reflect event changes in their respective marshling/unmarshling

option.value: Changes: - DeviceRoute to save roomId to Device data structure - DeviceRoutes to fix bugs with implementation and add university filtering - Domain to better transmit information between both sides - Hello to have roomId as Int instead of String - Json to save roomId as Int instead of String - RoomService for function that returns list of rooms by id to be filtered by university id - StudyRoomCapacity to be serializable (duuhhh) - Websocket to have better error handling on failure to send capacity and to reflect event changes in their respective marshling/unmarshling
